import axios from'axios';// const BASE_URL = process.env.BASE_URL;
var BASE_URL="http://localhost:8000";export function loginUser(data){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),data).then(function(response){console.log(response);});}export function logoutUser(){localStorage.removeItem("token");}export function registerUser(data){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/register"),data).then(function(response){console.log(response);});}
